name: Synthesis (Persona 5 Visual Novel)
description:
Synthesis is a visual novel created for ANTITHESIS, a Persona 5 Joker x Crow roleswap fanzine. In an alternate universe where Goro Akechi leads the Phantom Thieves and Akira Kurusu/Ren Amamiya is the Detective Prince, Synthesis lets you experience Joker and Crow's friendship and rivalry from a whole new perspective.

FEATURES:

  • A unique story set in an alternate universe, featuring the whole main cast of Persona 5
  • 24,000 words and over 2 hours of gameplay for a single playthrough
  • New Game Plus features
  • 4 different endings to discover
  • Original animated character sprites and CGs, created exclusively for this game
  • A carefully selected jazz and lo-fi soundtrack
  • Minor BL content
  • Joker's name is toggleable between Akira Kurusu and Ren Amamiya
  • Available for Windows and Mac

All characters and settings are the property of Atlus & SEGA.

Art and story by specterthief. 

PV by bumblingbeebo.

ANTITHESIS benefits ILGA World, an international federation of LGBTQ rights organizations.
